concept_hook: 19-year-old Japanese prodigy who dispatches foes with hidden razor blades and acrobatic precision, feeling a thrill in the perfect kill but guilt over her rising body count.
narrative_role: the prodigious upstart challenging established stars
media_archetype_inspiration: kunoichi assassin from Ninja Scroll anime

concept_hook: 38-year-old Brazilian veteran who blends capoeira rhythms with flirtatious taunts and groin strikes, loving the dance of dominance but weary of endless pain.
narrative_role: the cunning gatekeeper schooling cocky newcomers
media_archetype_inspiration: seductive capoeira master from Street Fighter series

concept_hook: 27-year-old Russian cursed by ancient rituals, her body spawning corrupting tendrils that invade and dissolve flesh—she savors the screams but clings to fading memories of mercy.
narrative_role: the eldritch horror terrorizing the roster
media_archetype_inspiration: body horror parasite host from Parasyte manga

concept_hook: 24-year-old LA tech whiz who unleashes hacking drones and shock gauntlets to paralyze nerves, exhilarated by control but paranoid about her implants failing mid-fight.
narrative_role: the gadget-savvy innovator disrupting traditional fights

concept_hook: 32-year-old Thai spirit medium whose trance dances summon draining apparitions and poisoned chi strikes, finding peace in the spirits she unleashes despite the lives she steals.
narrative_role: the reigning ethereal champion weaving fates
media_archetype_inspiration: spirit-channeling dancer from Mortal Kombat's Jade

concept_hook: 25-year-old French lab escapee spliced with feline DNA, slashing with retractable claws in berserk rages—she hates the beast within but craves the raw freedom of the hunt.
narrative_role: the tormented hybrid clawing for humanity
media_archetype_inspiration: feral cat hybrid from Catwoman comics
